tags: i honestly need to stop i cannot afford to be disappointed like this
summary: The logical, rational part of my brain: just because Caduceus seems to be confused by or disinterested in sex doesn’t mean he’s...
body:
The logical, rational part of my brain: just because Caduceus seems to be confused by or disinterested in sex doesn’t mean he’s asexual, stop getting your hopes up—

My last two starved for rep gremlin brain cells: ace ace ace ace ace ace ace ace ace ace ace ace aceaceaceaCEACEACEACEACEACe—

reblog.comment:

summary: Beau: So The Gentleman is your dad and you want your dad and mom to be together again but Ophelia Mardun isn't going to go for...
body:
Beau: So The Gentleman is your dad and you want your dad and mom to be together again but Ophelia Mardun isn't going to go for that unless somebody else were to seduce her away from him okay I know what I've gotta do-
Jester: That's not necess-
Beau, already fixing her hair and putting on her Good Robes: -and I'm gonna do it for you Jester because your friendship means so much to me
